description: Tattooed, muscular Vadim Black and ripped stud Jaxx Thanatos both have their eyes on the same guy, chiseled Diego Sans, that a dating app has matched them with. They decide to let him choose who he wants to date, and invite him over for a test run. Hairy chested Diego can’t pick between the two, and instead offers them both the chance to show him the goods. Will he choose Vadim’s tight hole and big dick or go with Jaxx’s eager, big bubble butt?
title: 2 Bottoms, 1 Top
